scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run compile:esm && npm run compile:cjs
scripts.test:react:e2e: concurrently -s first -k "npm run start --prefix tests/_app" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && jest -i -c tests/jest.config.js"
scripts.test:react:e2e:ci: concurrently -s first -k "npm run start --prefix tests/_app" "node ../scripts/wait-for-http.js http://localhost:3000 && jest -i -c tests/jest.config.js"
scripts.test:wrapper:react: npm run test:react:e2e:ci && npm run test:react:testing-library
